remarks: The value of the image structure's ordering when the order is compatible with the mapping function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
imasless.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasless.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasless.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasless.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
imasless.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` U ) $.
imasleval.n $e |- N = ( le ` R ) $.
imasleval.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( a e. V /\ b e. V ) /\ ( c e. V /\ d e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` a ) = ( F ` c ) /\ ( F ` b ) = ( F ` d ) ) -> ( a N b <-> c N d ) ) ) $.
imasleval $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( ( F ` X ) .<_ ( F ` Y ) <-> X N Y ) ) $.
$d .<_ c d $.
$d F a b c d $.
$d N a b c d $.
$d V a b c d $.
$d X c d $.
$d Y d $.
$d a b c d ph $.
